articles.title: Atmanirbhar Apps by Mitron Now Available for Android Devices, Aims to Promote Made in India Apps - News18
articles.description: Atmanirbhar Apps by Mitron aims to promote PM Modi's Atmanirbhar Bharat (self-sufficient India) initiative. The company says that the app would enable Indians to know more about homegrown apps.
articles.content: The Atmanirbhar Apps app by Indian short-video company Mitron is now available to download on Google Play Store. The app essentially lists a variety of homegrown apps from categories like business, e… [+1917 chars]
